name: suggestarr
description: SuggestArr is a self-hosted recommendation tool for Plex/Radarr libraries that suggests content to watch next based on ratings and history.
features: Content recommendations: Suggests movies and shows based on viewing history.
Plex integration: Analyzes Plex watch history for personalized suggestions.
Rating analysis: Uses ratings to improve recommendation accuracy.
Genre preferences: Learns preferred genres and themes over time.
Similar content: Finds movies and shows similar to favorites.
Trending content: Highlights popular and trending media.
Watchlist generation: Creates suggested watchlists for easy queuing.
Multi-user support: Provides personalized recommendations per user.
Radarr integration: Sends movie recommendations directly to Radarr.
Sonarr integration: Adds TV show suggestions to Sonarr automatically.
Discovery tools: Helps discover hidden gems in your library.
Web interface: Browses and manages recommendations through browser.
